amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that the fisheries disaster money in the Frelinghuysen amendment is intended for States that were declared fisheries disasters in 2012 as a direct result of Hurricane Sandy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 113-1 to clarify that the fisheries disaster money in the Frelinghuysen amendment is intended for states that were BOTH impacted by Hurricane Sandy and suffered a fisheries disaster in 2012.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Runyan to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
